original_title: There’s no such thing as a ‘coolcation’ – you’ll be sweating buckets on your Arctic getaway | CNN
article_summary: "Nordic Heat Wave: Once-cool summer destinations like Norway, Sweden, and Finland are increasingly vulnerable to extreme heat waves, with deadly consequences. The July heat wave was Finland's longest on record, and similar long-duration heat was seen in northern Norway and Sweden. Climate change is a global threat with no safe havens."</s>
